links: Clark Kimberling, The equation m^2 - 4k = 5n^2 and unique representations of positive integers, Fibonacci Quart. 45 (2007), no. 4, 304-312.
mathematica: Table[n^2 + n Floor[n #] - Floor[n #]^2 &@ GoldenRatio, {n, 0, 60}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 06 2016 *)
prog: (PARI) a(n) = my(fnt = floor(n*(sqrt(5)+1)/2));  n^2 + n*fnt - fnt^2; \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 05 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
